abstract: A sell-off in technology shares led U.S. markets lower, as concerns arose that the prices of computer-related stocks were outpacing their profit outlook.
snippet: A sell-off in technology shares led U.S. markets lower, as concerns arose that the prices of computer-related stocks were outpacing their profit outlook.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell yesterday after a JPMorgan report on Baidu.com spurred a sell-off in technology companies on concern that prices for computer-related shares have outpaced their profit outlook.

headline.main: Technology and Retail Worries Halt Rally
headline.print_headline: Technology and Retail Worries Halt Rally
